description: Server-side entry point for Remix framework handling HTTP requests, rendering React components to streams, and managing bot detection and CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, detects bots, and delegates to bot or browser request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the React app to the response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming the React app to the response.
